txt.en: Fish for the lost boot in the nearby pond.
Maggo Bunce is near the pond south-east of Nobottle.\n\nDeliver the boot to Maggo Bunce.
TBD 'Return the boot to the forlorn child'
Fish for the tiny waterlogged boot
You have been tasked with catching the most elusive of quarry: a toy boot?
Return the boot to Maggo Bunce

'Thank you!'

Maggo takes the still soggy boot and works it onto their doll’s foot.

'Mr. Pondfoot says he found this magic stone. He can’t tell you what it does, only that you’ll know what to do when the time is right.'

Maggo Bunce holds up a tattered old doll and draws your attention to its missing boot.

'Excuse me, but my friend Mr. Pondfoot here lost one of his shoes in the pond. Could you fish it up for him? He says he’ll reward you handsomely for your efforts.

'I think I see it glowing down in the water!'
